title: How to Make Golden Rum Cake

steps.headline: Preheat your oven to 325 degrees F or 165 degrees C. Grease and flour a pan, preferably 10 inches.
steps.description: Put some chopped nuts over the bottom of the pan to evenly cover it.

steps.headline: Mix your cake mix with your pudding mix in a bowl.
steps.description: Add your half cup of water, your vegetable oil, your half cup of rum (of your choice), and your 4 eggs. Pour this over your chopped nuts in the pan.

steps.headline: Let the cake sit for 10 minutes.
Brush the glaze onto the top and sides until the cake is covered.
Combine butter, 1/4 cup of water, and one cup of sugar to make the glaze for the cake.
Add in half a cup of rum when removed from heat.

text: Making the Cake Preheat your oven to 325 degrees F or 165 degrees C. Grease and flour a pan, preferably 10 inches. Put some chopped nuts over the bottom of the pan to evenly cover it. Mix your cake mix with your pudding mix in a bowl. Add your half cup of water, your vegetable oil, your half cup of rum (of your choice), and your 4 eggs. Pour this over your chopped nuts in the pan. Bake for 60 minutes.  Let the cake sit for 10 minutes.  Brush the glaze onto the top and sides until the cake is covered.  Making the Glaze Combine butter, 1/4 cup of water, and one cup of sugar to make the glaze for the cake. Boil for 5 minutes. Add in half a cup of rum when removed from heat.
